00022   enum EModuleDescriptionIntType {kModuleDescriptionIntModuleType, 
00023                                   kModuleDescriptionIntNameIndexOrMinusOne,
00024                                   kModuleDescriptionIntNameLength,
00025                                   kNModuleDescriptionIntsOrNCells,
00026                                   kModuleDescriptionIntNameIndex,
00027                                   kModuleDescriptionIntCellDimensionStart,
00028                                   kModuleDescriptionIntCellZPositionStart,
00029                                   kNModuleDescriptionInts};
00030 
00031   enum EModuleDescriptionFloatType {kModuleDescriptionWidth, kModuleDescriptionHeight,  
00032                                     kModuleDescriptionCellWidth, kModuleDescriptionCellHeight, 
00033                                     kNModuleDescriptionFloats};
00034 
00035   enum EModuleDescriptionOptions {kModuleDescriptionNormal=0, kModuleDescriptionWithCellDimension=1, kModuleDescriptionWithCellDimensionAndZPos=3};

00042   class ModuleDescription : public lcio::LCGenericObject {
00043     
00044   public: 
00047     ModuleDescription():
00048       _createdObject( true ),
00049       _nCells(0),
00050       _cellIndexStart(0),
00051       _cellDimensionStart(0),
00052       _cellZPosStart(0)
00053     {
00054       // create a generic object of variable size
00055       _obj = new LCGenericObjectImpl;
00056       _obj->setIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntModuleType,UCHAR_MAX);
00057     }
00058 
00059     ModuleDescription(const ModuleDescription &a) {
00060       //      std::cout <<  "  ModuleDescription::c tor> " << std::hex << static_cast<void *>(this)
00061       //                << " <- " << static_cast<void *>(a._obj) << std::dec << (a._createdObject ? " owner" : "" ) <<std::endl;
00062       _obj=0;
00063       if (a._obj && a._createdObject) {
00064         _obj=dynamic_cast<lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl *>(cloneLCGenericObject(a._obj));
00065         _createdObject=true;
00066         assert ( _obj );
00067       }
00068       else {
00069         _createdObject=false;
00070         _obj=a._obj;
00071       }
00072 
00073       _nCells=a._nCells;
00074       _cellIndexStart=a._cellIndexStart;
00075       _cellDimensionStart=a._cellDimensionStart;
00076       _cellZPosStart=a._cellZPosStart;
00077 
00078       //init();
00079       //      std::cout << "      " << std::hex << static_cast<void *>(this)  << " : " << static_cast<void *>(_obj) << std::dec << (_createdObject ? " owner" : "") <<std::endl;
00080     }

00085     ModuleDescription(UChar_t module_type, UInt_t n_cells, const std::string &name, EModuleDescriptionOptions options=kModuleDescriptionNormal)
00086       : _createdObject( true ),
00087         _nCells(n_cells),
00088         _cellIndexStart(0),
00089         _cellDimensionStart(0),
00090         _cellZPosStart(0)
00091     {
00092       // one for the length of the string
00093       UInt_t n_string_buffer_size=getNeededInts(name);
00094       // created generic object 
00095       _obj = new LCGenericObjectImpl;
00096         // enforce an allocation of the int and float array;
00097 
00098       UInt_t name_start = 0;
00099       switch (options) {
00100       case kModuleDescriptionNormal: {
00101         // hack to reserve space: set the last needed cell to a dummy value. This will automatically resize the underlying storage to 
00102         // the needed size.
00103         _cellIndexStart=kNModuleDescriptionIntsOrNCells;
00104         _obj->setIntVal(_cellIndexStart +  n_cells + n_string_buffer_size -1,0);
00105         _obj->setIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntModuleType,static_cast<int>(module_type));
00106         // In normal ModuleDescription objects only elements until  kNModuleDescriptionIntsOrNCells are needed plus one int 
00107         // per n_cells + buffer for the module name
00108         name_start = static_cast<int>(kNModuleDescriptionIntsOrNCells+n_cells);
00109         _obj->setIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntNameIndexOrMinusOne,name_start);
00110         
00111         _obj->setFloatVal(kNModuleDescriptionFloats+n_cells*2 -1 , 0. );
00112         break;
00113       }
00114       case kModuleDescriptionWithCellDimensionAndZPos: 
00115         _cellZPosStart=n_cells*4+kNModuleDescriptionFloats;
00116         // reserve more float space (see above):
00117         _obj->setFloatVal(_cellZPosStart+n_cells -1 , 0. );
00118 
00119       case kModuleDescriptionWithCellDimension: {
00120         _cellIndexStart=kNModuleDescriptionInts;
00121         _cellDimensionStart=n_cells*2+kNModuleDescriptionFloats;
00122         // reserve space (see above):
00123         _obj->setIntVal( _cellIndexStart + n_cells + n_string_buffer_size -1 ,0);
00124         // reserve float space (see above):
00125         _obj->setFloatVal(_cellDimensionStart+n_cells*2 -1 , 0. );
00126 
00127         _obj->setIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntModuleType,static_cast<int>(module_type));
00128         _obj->setIntVal(kNModuleDescriptionIntsOrNCells,n_cells);
00129 
00130         // set marker which indicates extended module description objects:
00131         _obj->setIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntNameIndexOrMinusOne,-1);
00132         name_start = static_cast<int>(kNModuleDescriptionInts+n_cells);
00133         _obj->setIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntNameIndex,name_start);
00134 
00135         _obj->setIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntCellDimensionStart,_cellDimensionStart);
00136         _obj->setIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntCellZPositionStart,_cellZPosStart);
00137 
00138         break;
00139       }
00140       }
00141 
00142       convertStringToInts(_obj, name, name_start, kModuleDescriptionIntNameLength);
00143     }
00144 
00145     ModuleDescription &setModuleType(UChar_t type) {
00146       _obj->setIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntModuleType,(int) type);
00147       return *this;
00148     }

00150     UChar_t getModuleType() const
00151     { 
00152       return (UChar_t) _obj->getIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntModuleType);
00153     }
00154 
00157     bool isValid() const {
00158       return getModuleType() < UCHAR_MAX;
00159     }

00167     std::string getModuleTypeName() const 
00168     {
00169       int name_start = _obj->getIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntNameIndexOrMinusOne);
00170       if (name_start < 0 ) {
00171         name_start = _obj->getIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntNameIndex);
00172       }
00173       return getStringFromInts(_obj, static_cast<unsigned int>(name_start) , kModuleDescriptionIntNameLength);
00174     }

00176     ModuleDescription &setCellXPos(UInt_t cell_index, float x_pos) {
00177 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00178       assert(cell_index < getNCells());
00179 #endif
00180       _obj->setFloatVal(kNModuleDescriptionFloats+(cell_index<<1),x_pos);
00181       return *this;
00182     }

00189       return *this;

00196       _obj->setFloatVal(kNModuleDescriptionFloats+(cell_index<<1),x_pos);

00198       return *this;

00204     ModuleDescription &setCellZPos(UInt_t cell_index, float z_pos) {
00205 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00206       assert(_cellZPosStart>0);
00207       assert(cell_index < getNCells());
00208 #endif
00209       _obj->setFloatVal(_cellZPosStart+cell_index,z_pos);
00210       return *this;

00213     Float_t getCellXPos(UInt_t cell_index) const
00214 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00215       throw (std::range_error)
00216 #endif
00217     {
00218 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00219       if ((cell_index<<1)>(UInt_t) getNFloat()) {
00220         throw std::range_error("ModuleDescription::getYPos> Cell index out of bounds!");
00221       }
00222 #endif
00223       return _obj->getFloatVal(kNModuleDescriptionFloats+(cell_index<<1));
00224     }

00227 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00228       throw (std::range_error)

00242     Float_t getCellZPos(UInt_t cell_index) const
00243 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00244       throw (std::range_error)
00245 #endif
00246     {
00247 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00248       assert( _cellZPosStart>0 );
00249       if (cell_index > getNCells()) {
00250         throw std::range_error("ModuleDescription::getYPos> Cell index out of bounds!");
00251       }
00252 #endif
00253       return _obj->getFloatVal(_cellZPosStart+cell_index);
00254     }
00255     
00256     UInt_t getNCells() const 
00257     //#ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00258     //      throw (std::logic_error)
00259     //#endif
00260     {
00261       return _nCells;
00262       //#ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00263       //      if ((getNFloat()-kNModuleDescriptionFloats)&1 !=0) {
00264       //        throw std::logic_error("Remaining number of floats of ModuleDescription object is not even (but should be for x/y position pairs of the cells).");
00265       //      }
00266       //#endif
00267       return (getNFloat()-kNModuleDescriptionFloats)/2;
00268     }

00277       return _cellDimensionStart>0;

00284     bool hasCellZPos() const {
00285       return _cellZPosStart>0;

00288     ModuleDescription &setCellWidth(float cell_width) {
00289       if (_cellDimensionStart>0) { 
00290         throw std::logic_error("ModuleDescription::setCellWidth> The module contains dimensions per cell. You must not specify a global cell width.");
00291       }
00292       _obj->setFloatVal(kModuleDescriptionCellWidth,cell_width);
00293       return *this;
00294     }

00296     float getCellWidth() const {
00297       if (_cellDimensionStart>0) { 
00298         throw std::logic_error("ModuleDescription::getCellWidth> The module contains dimensions per cell. You cannot get a global cell width.");
00299       }
00300       return _obj->getFloatVal(kModuleDescriptionCellWidth);
00301     }

00321     ModuleDescription &setIndividualCellWidth(UInt_t cell_index, float cell_width) {
00322       if (_cellDimensionStart==0) { 
00323         throw std::logic_error("ModuleDescription::setIndividualCellWidth> All are expected to have the same dimensions. You may not specify individual cell dimensions.");
00324       }
00325 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00326       assert(cell_index < getNCells());
00327 #endif
00328       _obj->setFloatVal(_cellDimensionStart+cell_index*2,cell_width);
00329       return *this;
00330     }

00340       return _obj->getFloatVal(_cellDimensionStart+cell_index*2);

00398     ModuleDescription &setGeometricalCellIndex(UInt_t cell_index, UInt_t geometrical_cell_index)

00440     const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00441       std::stringstream message;
00442       message << "i[1]:type, f[" << getNFloat()/2 << "]: (x,y)";
00443       return message.str();

00445     
00450     ModuleDescription(LCObject* obj) : 
00451       _createdObject(false)  {
00452       
00453       _obj = dynamic_cast<LCGenericObjectImpl*>( obj )  ;
00454       
00455       if( _obj==0 ){
00456 
00457         // could be an instance of ModuleDescription !?
00458         ModuleDescription* f = 
00459           dynamic_cast< ModuleDescription* >( obj ) ;
00460 
00461         if( f != 0 )
00462           _obj = f->obj() ;
00463 
00464       }
00465 
00466       // do some sanity checks ...
00467       if( _obj==0 ){
00468         throw Exception("Cannot create ModuleDescription from sth."
00469                         " that is not LCGenericObjectImpl" ) ;
00470       }
00471       
00472       UInt_t n_int=_obj->getNInt();
00473       UInt_t n_float=_obj->getNFloat();
00474 
00475       
00476       UInt_t name_start;
00477       if(  ( n_int    < kNModuleDescriptionIntsOrNCells )   || 
00478            ( n_float  < kNModuleDescriptionFloats)  ||
00479            ( _obj->getNDouble() != 0 )   ) {
00480         throw Exception("ModuleDescription(LCObject* obj): Wrong number of elements in object" ) ;
00481       }
00482       if (_obj->getIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntNameIndexOrMinusOne)==-1) {
00483         if (n_int < kNModuleDescriptionInts) {
00484           throw Exception("ModuleDescription(LCObject* obj): Wrong number of int elements in object" ) ;
00485         }
00486         _nCells=_obj->getIntVal(kNModuleDescriptionIntsOrNCells);
00487         _cellIndexStart=kNModuleDescriptionInts;
00488         _cellDimensionStart=_obj->getIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntCellDimensionStart);
00489         _cellZPosStart=_obj->getIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntCellZPositionStart);
00490         name_start=static_cast<UInt_t>( _obj->getIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntNameIndex) );
00491 
00492         UInt_t n_exp_floats=kNModuleDescriptionFloats;
00493         n_exp_floats+=_nCells*2;
00494         if (_cellDimensionStart > 0 ) {
00495           n_exp_floats+=_nCells*2;
00496         }
00497         if (_cellZPosStart>0) {
00498           n_exp_floats+=_nCells;
00499         }
00500         if (n_exp_floats!= n_float) {
00501           throw Exception("ModuleDescription(LCObject* obj): Wrong number of int elements in object" ) ;
00502         }
00503       }
00504       else {
00505         name_start=static_cast<UInt_t>( _obj->getIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntNameIndexOrMinusOne) );
00506 
00507         if  ( n_float < kNModuleDescriptionFloats ) {
00508           throw Exception("ModuleDescription::init> Number of floats smaller than expected for a ModuleDescription object. Maybe this is a different object type?");
00509         }
00510         n_float -= kNModuleDescriptionFloats;
00511         if (n_float & 1) {
00512           throw Exception("ModuleDescription::init> Number of cells is not an integer. Maybe this is not a ModuleDescription object?");
00513         }
00514         _nCells=n_float/2;
00515         _cellIndexStart=kNModuleDescriptionIntsOrNCells;
00516         _cellDimensionStart=0;
00517         _cellZPosStart=0;
00518       }
00519       
00520       UInt_t name_ints=getNeededInts(_obj->getIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntNameLength));
00521       if ( name_start + name_ints != static_cast<UInt_t>( _obj->getNInt()) ) {
00522         throw Exception("ModuleDescription(LCObject* obj): Start index and length of module type name does not match the arraysize. "
00523                         "Presumably, database and code versions do not match or wrong collection name/folder name.") ;
00524       }
00525       if (static_cast<UInt_t>(name_start-_cellIndexStart!=_nCells)) {
00526         throw Exception("ModuleDescription(LCObject* obj): The number of geometrical indices does not coincide with the number of cells. "
00527                         "Presumably, database and code versions do not match or wrong collection name/folder name.") ;
00528       }
00529 
00530     }

00534     LCGenericObjectImpl* obj() { return _obj ; }

00539     virtual ~ModuleDescription() { 
00540       //      std::cout << "  ModuleDescription::dtor> " << std::hex << static_cast<void *>(this)  << " : " << static_cast<void *>(_obj) << std::dec 
00541       //                << (_createdObject ? " owner" : "" ) <<std::endl;
00542       if( _createdObject )  delete _obj ; 
00543     }

00547     virtual int id() { return _obj->id() ; }

00550     // ---- need to implement LCGenericObject interface:
00551     
00552     int getNInt() const    { return _obj->getNInt() ; };
00553     int getNFloat() const  { return _obj->getNFloat() ; };
00554     int getNDouble() const { return 0 ; }; 
00555     
00556     int getIntVal(int index) const {
00557       return _obj->getIntVal( index ) ;
00558     };
00559     float getFloatVal(int index) const { 
00560       return _obj->getFloatVal( index ) ;
00561     };
00562     double getDoubleVal(int index) const {
00563       return  _obj->getDoubleVal( index ) ;
00564     };
00565     bool isFixedSize() const { return false ; };
00566     
00567     // ---- end of LCGenericObject interface
00568     
00569   protected:
00570     void init() throw (Exception) {
00571       // extended format ? 
00572       if (_obj->getIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntNameIndexOrMinusOne)==-1) {
00573         _nCells=_obj->getIntVal(kNModuleDescriptionIntsOrNCells);
00574         _cellDimensionStart=_obj->getIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntCellDimensionStart);
00575         _cellZPosStart=_obj->getIntVal(kModuleDescriptionIntCellZPositionStart);
00576       }
00577       else {
00578         _cellDimensionStart=0;
00579         _cellZPosStart=0;
00580         unsigned int n_float=getNFloat();
00581         if  ( n_float < kNModuleDescriptionFloats ) {
00582           throw Exception("ModuleDescription::init> Number of floats smaller than expected for a ModuleDescription object. Maybe this is a different object type?");
00583         }
00584         n_float -= kNModuleDescriptionFloats;
00585         if (n_float & 1) {
00586           throw Exception("ModuleDescription::init> Number of cells is not an integer. Maybe this is not a ModuleDescription object?");
00587         }
00588         _nCells=n_float/2;
00589       }
00590     }
00591     
00592     LCGenericObjectImpl* _obj ;
00593     bool _createdObject ;
00594     unsigned int _nCells;
00595     unsigned int _cellIndexStart;
00596     unsigned int _cellDimensionStart;
00597     unsigned int _cellZPosStart;
00598   };
